title: Why Trump let Don McGahn talk to Mueller
cleanedCompare: decision    's legal team allow white house counsel don mcgahn talk special counsel robert mueller without restrictions made part lawyers calculated not good legal standing prevent fit strategy cooperative investigation, according sources sought explain mcgahn's extensive interviews. why trump let don mcgahn talk mueller

metadata.title: Why Trump let Don McGahn talk to Mueller - CNNPolitics
metadata.ogTitle: Why Trump let Don McGahn talk to Mueller
metadata.twitterTitle: Why Trump let Don McGahn talk to Mueller
metadata.ogDescription: The decision by President Donald Trump's legal team to allow White House counsel Don McGahn to talk to special counsel Robert Mueller without restrictions was made in part because the lawyers calculated they did not have a good legal standing to prevent it and because it fit with the strategy to be cooperative with the investigation, according to sources who sought to explain McGahn's extensive interviews.
metadata.description: The decision by President Donald Trump's legal team to allow White House counsel Don McGahn to talk to special counsel Robert Mueller without restrictions was made in part because the lawyers calculated they did not have a good legal standing to prevent it and because it fit with the strategy to be cooperative with the investigation, according to sources who sought to explain McGahn's extensive interviews.
metadata.twitterDescription: The decision by President Donald Trump's legal team to allow White House counsel Don McGahn to talk to special counsel Robert Mueller without restrictions was made in part because the lawyers calculated they did not have a good legal standing to prevent it and because it fit with the strategy to be cooperative with the investigation, according to sources who sought to explain McGahn's extensive interviews.

metadata.twitterTitle: China denies Trump's claim it hacked Clinton's emails
metadata.twitterDescription: China has denied an accusation by U.S. President Donald Trump that it hacked the emails of Hillary Clinton, his Democratic opponent in the 2016 election. "We are firmly opposed to all forms of cyberattacks and espionage," foreign ministry spokeswoman Hua Chunying said at a regular briefing...
metadata.alIphoneAppName: ABC News - Breaking US & World News

title: Trump tweets China hacked Clinton’s emails
cleanedCompare: trump tweeted early wednesday former secretary state hillary clinton's emails hacked obtained illegally china, warning justice department act news risk losing its credibility. trump tweets china hacked clinton’s emails

metadata.title: Trump tweets China hacked Clinton’s emails | TheHill
metadata.description: President Trump tweeted early Wednesday that former Secretary of State Hillary Clinton's emails were hacked and obtained illegally by China, warning that the Justice Department must act on the news or risk losing its credibility.
metadata.keywords: Donald Trump, China, Hillary Clinton, Trump administration, Trump tweets, private email server,Hillary Clinton, Donald Trump,
